channel.title: Elixir on Gript
channel.description: Recent content in Elixir on Gript

item.title: What Is Elixir? Erlang Primer
item.description:
Elixir is a powerful, dynamic functional language. It can be used to create highly scalable web applications - and is very easy to use.

Elixir uses the Erlang VM to achieve its super low latency results and has exceptional support for Fault-tolerance.
